law.catch_line: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, the provisions of Title 7 of the Insurance Article apply ...

text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, the provisions of Title 7 of the Insurance Article apply to managed care organizations.
Before approving a transaction under § 7-306 of the Insurance Article, the Insurance Commissioner shall consult with the Secretary.

The Insurance Commissioner:
Shall adopt regulations establishing a reporting materiality threshold; and
May adopt regulations necessary to implement the provisions of this section.
The provisions of this section may not apply to any transaction preempted by federal law.
